summary: TERA Armor Collection for the standard CBBE body. This mod includes 40 FEMALE armors.
descriptionHtml:
- THANKS FOR MORE THAN 7000 ENDORSEMENTS! -

[color=#c7fd22][b]News[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
So, I had no time. Fucking reallife. :D Another modder,raisuli2013, wrote me and asked for my permission to work on a Bodyslide and HDT addon for my mod. He did it, and here it is:
[size=4][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59267/]HDT and Bodyslide conversion for Frigus' Tera Armor Collection CBBE[/url][/size]
Download and endorse it!


[color=#c7fd22][b]Description[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
This is my own conversion of asianboy345's TERA Armor Collection UNP, based on its version 1.75. It ONLY includes the 47 female armors and it is standalone.
You can only use it with the standard CBBE body and it is weight slider compatible.
Helmets and Hoods are invisible. They are in game, because of the bonus armor rating from perks.


[color=#c7fd22][b]Requirements[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]Calientes Female Body Mod Big Bottom Edition v3.2.3[/url]
Skyrim (with latest patch)


[color=#c7fd22][b]Installation[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
Attention:

Before doing anything, start your game and make a new savegame.

If you have an old version of the Tera CBBE Armor Collection installed, then delete it completely.
Deinstall it from NMM and after that check if this files are still in the Skyrim Data (…Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data) folder:
- TERAArmors_CBBE.esp
- TeraArmors_CBBE and TeraArmors2_CBBE folders in the …Data/meshes folder
- TeraArmors_CBBE and TeraArmors2_CBBE folders in the …Data/textures folder
Delete the files and folders manually.
After that you can install the current full installation.

NMM Installation:
Press the „Download“-Button and install the mod in the Nexus Mod Manager

Manual Installation:
Copy all files from the archive into your Data folder of Skyrim. (…Steam/SteamApps/common/Skyrim/Data)


[color=#c7fd22][b]Known Bugs[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
-> Clipping issues can occure, especially when you use animation mods. I'll do my best to fix them, but they can't promise anything.

-> DO NOT DROP ANY PART OF THESE ARMORS ON THE GROUND. The world models are not finished and may cause weird issues. Keep them in the Inventory, any chests or sell them to a vendor.

-> Rings float anywhere, but not on the right fingers.

Thanks for your feedback!


[color=#c7fd22][b]Next update [last update: -][/b][/color]
=========================================================================================[list][*] pending..[/list]

[color=#c7fd22][b]Changelog[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
v1.3
-> Optimized meshes:
Castanic Hunter, Silver Spellword, Rubicite, White Mage, Highelf Paladin, Berserker Metal, Elven Inquisitor, Scion Plate, Trielek, Elven Scaled, Quantum, Myrmidon, Jalmarak, Skysoar, Viator, Karassia, Rysio, Voidmeld, Arcadia, Nightwinder, Leafchaser, Atroscine, Clarion, Deathshell, Viridinium, Xenocite, Sententia, Val Tirkai, Elenium, Timerender, Steelgaze, Blade Dancer, Brigandine, Deathskin, Sikhanda, Divinesight, Ascendant, Gildhorn, Elseworlder, Royalrite
-> Seven new armors added:
Tenebrescent, Chaos Bloodplate, Phonic, Ebon Shroud, Graceshed, Necrosin, Elleon
-> Fixed and updated crafting recipes
-> Robes are now light armors and have updated enchantments
-> Elleon has now preview models for every armor part

v1.2
-> First person issues fixed:
Skysoar, Scion Plate, Arcadia, Divinesight, Elenium, Elseworlder, High Elf Paladin, Leafchaser, Quantum, Steelgaze, Timerender, Val Tirkai, Voidmeld, Xenocite
-> Karassia gloves bug fixed
-> Brigandine mesh optimized
-> Nightwinder shoe textur fixed
-> Clarion mesh optimized
-> Gildhorn boots replaced with Elenium boots
-> Gildhorn clipping bugs fixed

v1.11
-> Elven Inquisitor gauntlets have a texture
-> Changing armors back in standard forge categories, because of armor upgrade bonuses
-> Viator armor updated
-> Trielek cuirass weight bug fixed

v1.1
-> Karassia weight bug solved
-> Castanic boots are now shown in game
-> Robes now have enchantments
-> Trielek clipping fixed
-> It shouldn't be possible to equip more than one hood/helmet anymore
-> Royalrite gloves have the right texture
-> Viridinium panties optimized
-> Leafchaser clipping fixed


[color=#c7fd22][b]FAQ[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
Q: Will you make a bodyslide/Slim, etc. Version?
A: Nope, I don't have any time left to do any further versions, except bugfixing. The conversion took enough time.

Q: The armors are not shown in the forge categories!
A: Please patch Skyrim to the newest version.

Q: Bodies/Armors are invisible when equipped, why?
A: This is an installation bug. Please redownload and reinstall the whole mod.

Q: I found some Bugs. What should I do?
A: Write your problems in the comments section or send me a PM. Sometimes some Screens would be nice to see the issue.

Q: So, how I force my companion to wear such an armor?
A: In this case, I recommend this mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14037]UFO - Ultimate Follower Overhaul[/url]

Q: Why did you switched all armors to the vanilla crafting categories?
A: This is the only way to get the double armor rating bonus.

Q: I can't see the helmets!
A: TERA has no helmets. They are only ingame for the armor bonus, when wearing the full armor.


[color=#c7fd22][b]Armor overview[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
Light Armors:
- Leather: Castanic Hunter, Myrmidon
- Studded: Viator, Blade Dancer
- Hide: Karassia, Brigandine
- Scaled: Elenium, Voidmeld
- Elven: Silver Spellword, Elven Scaled, Jalmarak, Gildhorn
- Glass: Quantum, Deathskin, Phonic
- Dragonscale: Rysio, Elseworlder, Graceshed

- Daedric AND Dragon Perks: Elleon

Heavy Armors:
- Steel: High Elf Paladin, Steelgaze
- Steel Plate: Scion Plate
- Dwarven: Elven Inquisitor, Arcadia, Xenocite
- Orcish: Berserker Metal, Rubicite
- Ebony: Trielek, Tenebrescent
- Daedric: Val Tirkai, Deathshell, Viridinium, Chaos Bloodplate
- Dragonplate: Atroscine, Sententia, Ascendant

Robes:
- Miscellaneous: Clarion, White Mage, Leafchaser, Nightwinder, Timerender, Skysoar, Divinesight, Royalrite, Sikhanda, Necrosin, Ebon Shroud


[color=#c7fd22][b]Featured videos[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
:: Thanks to CaptainShack

[youtube]1DobLR2RzNM[/youtube]


[color=#c7fd22][b]Permission[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
En Masse Entertainment and asianboy345 gave me the persmission to use the armors for this mod.


[color=#c7fd22][b]Credit[/b][/color]
=========================================================================================
Thanks to..

En Masse Entertainment
asianboy345 for his great armor mod: [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/25846]TERA Armors Collection for Skyrim - Male and UNP female[/url]
Bethesda for developing Skyrim
